Body:
t = Template(
    """
            x is ${x}
            <%def name="foo()">
                ${caller.foosub(x=10)}
            </%def>

            <%def name="bar()">
                bar: ${caller.barsub()}
            </%def>

            <%call expr="foo()">
                <%def name="foosub(x)">
                this is foo body: ${x}

                <%call expr="bar()">
                    <%def name="barsub()">
                    this is bar body: ${x}
                    </%def>
                </%call>

                </%def>

            </%call>
"""
    )
assert result_lines(t.render(x=5)) == ['x is 5', 'this is foo body: 10',
    'bar:', 'this is bar body: 10']
